name: auto-unit-test-workspace
description: Workspace para backend e frontend com scripts de desenvolvimento em paralelo

scripts.build: npm --workspace backend run build && npm --workspace frontend run build && npm run build:bundle
scripts.build:bundle: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir -p dist/backend dist/frontend && shx cp -r backend/dist/* dist/backend/ && shx cp -r frontend/dist/* dist/frontend/
